summary: Good work! 🌟 Here are some general recommendations for improving your Python code.

params.bad_code:
Instead of: 
```python
import sys


def print_python_version():  # [missing-function-docstring]
    print(sys.version)
```
params.good_code:
Try: 
```python
import sys


def print_python_version():
    """Function printing python version."""
    print(sys.version)
```
